title: 3DSceneLayerInfo
description: The 3DSceneLayerInfo describes the properties of a single layer ina store.

id.description: Unique numeric ID of the layer.

href.description: The relative URL to the 3DSceneLayerResource. Only presnt as part of the SceneServiceInfo resource.

layerType.description: The user-visible type of this layer, one of {Point, Line, Polygon, 3DObject, IntegratedMesh, Pointcloud}.

spatialReference.description: The spatialReference of the layer including the vertical coordinate system. Wkt is included to support custom spatial references.

heightModelInfo.description: Enables consuming clients to perform quick test to determine whether this layer is compatible (with respect to its horizontal and vertical CRS) with existing content.

version.description: The ID of the last update session in which any resource belonging to this layer has been updated.

alias.description: The display alias to be used for this layer.

copyrightText.description: Copyright and usage information for the data in this layer.

items.description: Describes the capabilities of the scene layer.

cachedDrawingInfo.description: Indicates if any stylization infomraton represented as drawingInfo is addtionally captured as part of the binnary mesh representation for optimal client side access. Currently color component of the drawingInfo is supported.

fields.description: A collection of objects that describe each attribute field regarding its field name, datatype and a user friendly name {name,type,alias}. It includes all fields that are included as part of the I3S layer as derived from a source input feature layer.

attributeStorageInfo.description: Provides the schema and layout used for storing attribute content in binary format in I3S.

materialDefinitions.description: List of materials classes used in this layer. _TBD_ use a separated JSON resource?

textureSetDefinitions.description: define the set of textures that can be referenced by meshes

geometryDefinitions.description: Define the layouts of mesh geometry and its attributes

attributeSetDefinitions.description: Define the layouts of mesh geometry and its attributes. WARNING: only **SINGLE** definition is supported at v1.7. length must 0 or 1
